title: GENERAL
fullText:
The battery system or BESS enclosure shall be located so that access to the enclosure is not obstructed by the structure of the building or by fixtures and fittings within the building.
The battery system or BESS enclosure design, layout and construction should be clean, dry and ventilated, and provide and maintain protection against detrimental environmental conditions and other external factors. The enclosure should be designed to minimize likelihood of a build-up of other materials around or on the BESS, or an infestation of insects or vermin, or similar issues occurring that may cause a hazard.
NOTE For battery system room requirements, see Clause 6.2.6.
